lexUnit.name: govern.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: conduct the policy and affairs of (a state, organization, or people).

sentence.text: The US also received the right to govern an area of land called the Panama Canal Zone on both sides of the canal .
It is undemocratic to govern an area without an electoral mandate .
